mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO base_line_score ( `user_key`, `similarity_score`, `similarity_score_org`, `similarity_score_role`, `hour_score`, `packge_score`, `compress`, `frequent_id`, `time`, `type`, start_time, end_time, sys_id ) VALUES
( #{item.userKey}, #{item.similarityScore}, #{item.similarityScoreOrg}, #{item.similarityScoreRole}, #{item.hourScore}, #{item.packgeScore}, #{item.compress}, #{item.frequentId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{item.type}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.sysId} )
